title: Tailwind CSS 4.x Multi-Theme System
subtitle: Experience the latest Tailwind CSS 4.x theme switching technology with 7 beautiful themes, using native CSS variables and @theme directive for smooth color transitions

features.title: Theme System Features
features.description1: Based on Tailwind CSS 4.x CSS-First configuration, supporting dynamic theme switching
features.description2: Using native CSS variables with smooth color transition animations

features.description6: Easy to maintain and extend, supporting custom theme color additions
